p: Simeprevir, Ergotamine, Bromocriptine and Tadalafil form a number of hydrogen bonds and hydrophobic interactions with the protein (noncovalent interactions detected by GOLD are reported in ( Table S2, supporting information). Among them, most of the interactions with the active site residues are categorized as hydrophobic ( Table 2). Both Simeprevir and Ergotamine form a hydrogen bond with at least one of the catalytic residues.
